string.value: You don't appear to be in any games right now...
{0} has opened the Academy with magic! Enroll and discover your abilities... and probably casted out :P
A new Academy has been opened by {0}! Enroll to be expelled!
{0} is introducing the chaos in the Academy! Enroll and discover your abilities... and probably casted out :P
A new Academy has been opened by {0}! Enroll to get suspended!
You can't enroll now! The Academy has started its Face-to-Face class.
You've already enrolled!
1 minute left to Enroll
{0} seconds left to Enroll
Not enough students, cancelling enrollment!
School is starting, please wait while I assign staffs and update the database.
{0} is banned for attempting an exploit (no names starting with /)
{0}, please change your name to enroll
Sorry, max students limit has been reached!
{0} has enrolled to the Academy. {1} students, {2} minimum, {3} max
{0} Please click the enroll button below or {1} and come with me, so I can PM you your hidden magic. You may not enroll the Academy until you do.
You can't run away! YOU'RE EXPELLED! Get back in the ground... jeez!
{0} has discarded its enrollment!
{0} students remain.
Hey I didn't ask you anything yet!
You don't seem to be enrolling...
I can't find a student by that name!
This answer is not valid!
{0} has voted to bully {1}.
{0} has voted to expel {1}.
{0} has not voted for 2 nights in a row. The forces of good have seen this as a terrible crime, and {0} suddenly falls, dead. {1}
You Axel!!! You are now the Luther...
Choice accepted.
\nKlaus 👳🏻‍♂️ is {0}.
{0} was the Klaus. As Ben, you became like Klaus 👳🏻‍♂️ to eliminate the bullies around the Academy. .
{0} was Ben, and has now stepped up to fill {1}'s place just like Klaus 👳🏻‍♂️.
Your power tells you that {0} is {1}!
Who do you want to expel?
Who do you want to scan?
Who do you want to shoot? {0} bullet(s) remain.
Where do you want to teleport?
Who do you want to discover their ability?
Who do you want to guard?
Who do you want to bully?
Who do you want to sniped out?
Who is your role model?
Who do you want to persuade to your order?
Make sure you discuss with {0}
and
You are Cha-cha 😾. You are a side-changer. If Luther 🐺 meets you, you become his friend, take his side and help him.
You are Detective Chuck 🕵️. Each day you have powers to examine a student or staff and reveal their roles to you. But be careful, Luther 🐺 might know about you and plan to suspend you.
You are Diego 🍻, the drunkard. You spend your whole day drinking. As you can hold your breath, which makes you special, Luther on bullying you gets drunk and forgets to bully for one night.

You are the Boss Guardian 👼, The guardian of the Academy. You save the Academy like an angel by guarding them. You must find Klaus 👳🏻‍♂ or Detective Chuck 🕵 and help to eliminate the bad students. However, if you randomize your guarding, you might guard a wolf by 50%.
You are Hazel 🔫. The strongest man who can choose to suspend two person from the academy within the day time.
You are Number Five 💃🏻. Every night you visit a member of Academy to have some fun. But if you visit Luther 🐺 or his team and Chet Rodo🔪, you will get suspended.
You are Axel 🖕. You are the imposter. Once Luther 🐺 and his team is expelled, you take their place and bully the other people in the Academy
YOU ARE JUST LUTHER 🐺!! XD (good on ya) You want to take over the Academy. So you want to expel all the good forces from the Academy and want to make it your own with your fellow mates.
You are Klaus 👳🏻‍♂. You can check the on the other students and also teachers. But, be careful, due to your special powers, Luther 🐺 will attack you and kill you.
You are a Student 👱🏻‍♂. You have no special work, only study and get suspended.
You are the Conductor 👺. If you triggers all the students to let you expelled from the Academy, you win automatically!
You are Vanya 👶, the member who is abandoned since birth and has a role model in his eyes. If the model is expelled out, you get angry and plan to help out Luther 🐺 and his team.
You are The Handler 👁. You just have one work in the academy. You just know who is the Klaus 👳🏻‍♂ and help the Academy to expel the bullies.
You are Ben 🙇🏻‍♂. Follower of Klaus 👳🏻‍♂️. If he gets expelled by the Academy, you take his place.

You are Viktor 👤. Each night you visit a member to convert them into your format and make them a part of the gang. Be careful of Reginald Hargreeves 💂. He doesn't like you and wants to expel you from the Academy.

You are Reginald Hargreeves 💂. Each night, you search for Viktor and his gang and kill them. You are the Principal of the Academy and every student and staff needs to follow you. Klaus 👳🏻‍♂ and Detective Chuck 🕵️ helps you to eliminate the bad students.
The night is getting near and the lobby will get closed as the sun sets, and the students gather to decide who they are expelling this evening... Everyone now has {0} seconds to vote!
The sun has risen. All of you have {0} seconds to make your accusations, defenses, or just talk.
The sun sets. Everyone heads to their designated dormitories, weary after another stressful day. Night magicians: you have {0} seconds use your abilities!
The students have cast their votes, amid doubts and suspicions. {0} is expelled. {1}
Unable to come up with a proper decision on who to expel, the students returns to their dormitories for the night, frustrated...
Something is fishy, for no one voted! No expelling mob tonight...
The students gather in the lobby as the sun rises, but do not see {0}. They wander over to the student’s dorm, to find {0} disemboweled, an old badge shoved down their throat.
As the morning comes where everyone went to cafeteria to have their breakfast, they were shocked, they saw an angel, impaled on top of the ceiling {0}, the Boss Guardian 👼.

As everyone comes out of their dormitories, they find pieces of a shotgun strewn about... then legs... then fingers... then the body of {0}, floating in the fountain near in the monument of Reginald Hargreeves 💂, dead from Luther’s attack. You have lost Hazel 🔫.
The students awake in the morning, to find Klaus {0} has black-eye and his head was literally broken. Klaus 👳🏻‍♂️ is dead.
The students woke up, and as they walk to the hall, they smell something... alcoholic, and... blood?? ... the bar is destroyed! After cleaning the blood out, the remains of {0} are found, torn apart.
As the sun rises above the Academy, the students find the corpse of {0} sitting over the gymnasium’s bleacher, but her ears are... HER EARS ARE MISSING? WHAT A RUMOR!
As the students woke up in the morning, they smell a terrible stink. They follow the smell to find {0} shredded apart in the pig pen, head missing. RAWRRRRRR\n{1}

Reginald Hargreeves supervised the dormitory, and as he walked through the hall, he saw a bunk, he saw {0}'s smoking and doing drugs in the area... the students inspects it to find a body lying in front of the hall. A Viktor has been sniped by Reginald Hargreeves!
The students gather the next morning in the lobby, to sighs of relief - it appears there was no bullying the previous night.
You have been persuaded by the Bullies. As you were Cha-cha, you have now become a part of them!
The bullies counterpart(s): {0}
{0} was persuade... but was Cha-cha, and became a Luther! Congrats on your new teammate!
Oh no! The bullies attack you. WHAHAHAHAHAHA
Oh no! {0} was Diego! Now you are drunk, and can't bully tomorrow night because of your hangover...
You tried to guard Luther! The bullies has attacked you.
You have saved {0}'s life!
{0} was not bullied, so you didn't do much of anything.
You went to guard {0}, but they weren’t in their dorm!
A Boss Guardian 👼 was watching over you last night and fought off a bully!
Number Five 💃 chose the wrong night to not teleport. {0} has been bullied by Luther!
Odd... {0} was not in their dorm! No entertainment for you...
You teleport into {0}'s dorm for a little fun, only to be see the bully. You have the spotlight by being in their way and they bullied you as well as the student whom you had visited.
{0} teleported into the wrong dorm last night! {0}'s didn’t get the calculation right... how sad :(
{0} slips into {1}'s dorm, ready to have a little fun and excitement if her calculation is right. Instead, {0} finds Luther bullying {1}! Luther ran quuckly to {0} and punch... {0} is suspended.
You see {0} is not a bully, as you got the calculation right!
It was a bit dark, so you couldn't see well enough, but in the middle of the night you wake up with Number Five 💃 riding you. Both of you finish up, then they slip back out silently...
You caught {0} scanning about! That must be Detective Chuck 🕵️!
Your abilities has shown you that {0} is {1}.
Looks like {0} came back positive after a night with Number Five 💃! Hazel 🔫 got revenge. {1} is expelled.
A loud shot will be heard from the lobby, students turns to see {0} standing over {1}'s body, a gun still aimed at the head. {2}
The Luther has won!
The Luthers have won!
The Students have won!
Oh no! You expelled the Conductor! The Conductor is the owner of the academy, silly.
Remaining living students, roles, and team:
{0} has voted to persuade {1}
{0} was sent to do your dirty work, and persuade {1}... however, they were Reginald Greeves! {0} is dead!
{0} came to your dorm last night, ready to persuade you.... but you shoved your sword right through them. A viktor is dead... {1} remain!
Viktor has persuaded you to their order! You are now part of Viktor’s people. Every other night, you will have a chance to persuade another student.
Viktors: {0}
{0} has joined the gang!
{0} was sent to do your dirty work, and persuade {1}... but no one was at the dorm!
All the bullies have died, and the only people left standing have all been persuaded to Viktor's gang.. The Viktor's Gang has won!
You went to snipe {0}, but they are already dead!
You go into {0}'s dorm and find them smoking and doing drugs in the bunk. You quickly run to have your sniper right through Viktor.
You go to {0}'s dorm, but there is no signs of smoking and smell of marijuana. You return at your office, convinced that {0} is not a part of Viktor’s gang.
{0}'s role model just died! In their rage, they have become like Luther!
{0} has died! In your rage, you have become like Luther! Your new teammates are: {1}
a Student 👱🏻‍♂️
Diego🍻
Number Five 💃🏻
Klaus 👳🏻‍♂️
Axel🖕
Boss Guardian 👼
Detective Chuck 🕵
Luther 🐺
Cha-cha 😾
Hazel 🔫
the Conductor 👺
Allison 🃏
Vanya 👶
the Handled 👁
a Viktor 👤
Reginald Hargreeves 💂
Ran away
🪦 Expelled
☁ Enrolled
Students Enrolled
Pogo 👷🏻‍♂️
You are Pogo 👷🏻‍♂️. If there are any other pogos, you will know who they are because you know how time travel works. Otherwise, you are just a Student.
As everyone finished their homeworks, they find the body of {0} broken and the bones are everywhere, blood splattered everywhere. One of your pogos has died!
The pogos are: {0}
Your newest member heads over to {0}'s house to convert them, but instead finds the house a complete wreck, blood everywhere, and bits of wolf fur snagged on the doorway...
The pack heads to {0}'s house to eat them, but they are met by a tall dark figure, armed to the teeth. The Guardian Angel fights everyone off, and you head back defeated.
You send {0} to try to convert {1}, however their belief was too strong, and you were unable to convert them :(
@{1}, a student with the name {0} has already enrolled. Please change your name to enroll.
You teleported into {0}'s dorm for a bit of fun... but as you are leaving, you happen to smell a strange odor as the smoke is coming from the dorm...
was
Students wakes up in the morning, and notices that {0} is not around... They check each dormitories to find the remains of {0}.
As the students gather as the sun rises, the find {0}, who escaped somehow last night...
Odd.... {0} didn't show up for the pogo's meeting this morning... O.o
Discarding the enrollment while the batch year is starting has been disabled by the Principal and professors!
is suspended
{0} added to admin list. Use /config to change group settings.
You are already enrolled in other Academy!
Your group has managed to start multiple games... Killing extras.
Your group is currently in the queue. Position: {0} / {1}
Sorry, I'm about to start a short maintenance break, you can't start a game right now.\nWaiting on {0} games to end...\nGo to @stormynightnews for more information
Sorry, max concurrent games has been reached ({0}). \nPosition in queue: {1} / {1}
{0} is a preferred group, and has skipped the queue!
There is no Enrollment running. Build a new Academy with /startgame or start a chaos game with /startchaos
Only a group admin can run this command.
After this game, I am shutting down for maintenance.
After this game, I am shutting down momentarily for an update (automated).
UserId was null. Are you sure you sent this as a reply?
{0} is already an admin!
{0} is not an admin!
{0} removed from admin list.
Language set to {0}
KLAUS IS NOT AROUND!
Time's up!

You are Sissy 💘. You have been left behind by the person you love named Vanya, and by that, you were chosen by the heaven to serve for him by saving two students from loving each other for eternity. If one of them dies, the other one dies as well as their strings are connected to each other.

You are Lila Pitts 🎭. Legend has it that your ancestors mastered mimicry, and you could mimic any students that is normal or have power. You have inherited some of their abilities. Choose a player, when that player dies, you will take their powers but somehow, you can be just a normal person.

You are Carl Cooper 🎯. You have an insomnia and by that, you are always awake every night and you have the habit to observe the academy since it has been suspicious that every night, some of the students are dying. If you die, you can choose someone else to kill because you have been observing the students around the academy. If you have been attacked by Luther, you have a chance to take a bad guy down, but will not be able to choose a student to kill.
You are the Chet Rodo 🔪. Recently expelled from the Umbrella Academy, your goal is for everyone else to die. Every night, you can add a student’s body to your collection.
You have been struck by love. {0}'s memory will never fade in your heart. If one of you dies, the other one will die out of sorrow. If one of you wins, the other one wins too.
Sissy's arrow has struck you! You are madly in love with {0}! If they die, you will die too. If one of you two wins, you will both win.
The students has chosen to expel you! This is your last chance to expose the student who is acting strange in the academy!
{0} fumbles for their lies as he have been disappointed to the students for expelling him...
{0} the Carl Cooper did not make it in time to expose a strange student, as the result of it, the guards took him out of the academy...
As he decides, {0} looked at the crowd, he walked towards {1}. {1} has been exposed and needs to be expelled too. {2}
You've been attacked! In your last moments, you have the chance to expose someone... make it quick!
The blow to {0} was too much, so much that they couldn't even reach for their sidearm, as they lay in a pool of blood...
As {0} lays there, gasping for their final talk, they can't decide who to expose... and accept the expulsion.
{0} walked out to the Academy.... but not without exposing someone, {1}, has been exposed because of acting strange in the academy. {2}
Luthers tried to bully Carl Cooper last night, but Carl Cooper was able to expose one down with them as they have been expelled! {0} has been removed from the academy.
Luthers tried to bully Carl Cooper last night, but Carl Cooper was able to take the 🐺 {0} down as he is sure to exposed him!
Luthers attempted to have a nice late night entertainment, but were instead greeted by a crazed murderer! {0} was killed in the fight!

This student thought his day already ended because he already finished his homework {0}, but they were wrong. The students gather in the morning to find {0} split from head to toe, but oddly the liver was missing... Chet Rodo has struck again! {1}
You tried to collect {0}'s body for your collection, but you were fought off by the Boss Guardian! No kill for you tonight...
Viktor sends {0} to try to persuade {1}, but instead a shot rings out and {0}'s body comes flying out from the door of the Academy! {0} is dead....
Viktor sends {0} to try to persuade {1}, but instead {0}'s body comes flying out of the from the door of the Academy, knives pushed into every part of their body! WHAT A PSYCHO! {0} is dead....

{0} sneaks over to {1}'s house, pops open the door, and is immediately greeted by a crazed maniac with a knife!!! {1} plunges the knife deep into {0}'s organs in alphabetical order, cackling the entire time! {0} is dead D:
You tried to guard Chet Rodo, but they came out and stabbed you 89 times! You are dead....
You teleport into {0}'s dorm, and start having a little fun. All seems great until {0} pulls out a knife and starts stabbing you, laughing like a maniac! You have died....
The students sees {0}'s body, lying dead in the lobby with countless stab wounds. {0} is dead.
Lila Pitts {0} has chosen to mimic a Pogo, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into a Pogo. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
Lila Pitts {0} has chosen to mimic Viktor, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into a Viktor. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
Lila Pitts {0} has chosen to mimic Luther, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform as Luther. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
The only student left standing is Chet Rodo! They have claimed their justice!
Who do you want to murder tonight?
With {0}'s dying breath, {1} rushes over and falls, crying. They cannot stand the loss of their loved one, and shoot themselves with the nearest pistol they can find. {2}
Who do you want to mimic if they got expelled or die?
Who do you want the lovers to be? Choose the first player
Who do you want the lovers to be? Choose the second player
Carl Cooper 🎯
Sissy 💘
Chet Rodo 🔪
Lila Pitts 🎭
You have become the wild child. You role model is {0}.
True love endures! The lovers have won!
AAAAAAAAAA!!! The academy was bewildered by the loud noise from the lobby. Only to find out that {0}, Vanya, tried to sneak up to Carl Cooper and convert them. Well, {1}.
A student with an umbrella tattoo has tried to persuade you to their gang, but your innocence was too strong.
You are already on the wait list for {0}.
You have been added to the wait list for {0}. I will PM you when the next game is starting.
A new Enrollment for the Academy is starting in {0}.
Morning comes, and the remaining two students walk out to the lobby. {0} takes a look at {1}, gets a big grin on their face, pulls out a knife, and takes {1} out.
Everyone in the Academy has died... there's nothing but bodies left. No one wins this round, except the vultures...

As the sun rises, {0} and {1} walk out into the Academy. {0} pulls out their knife, and jumps at {1}. {1} pulls out a pistol and fires a shot into {0}'s face as {0} lands, plunging the knife deep into {1}. Both are dead, the Academy is empty, there is no winner...
You failed to make a choice, so the moderator has chosen for you: {0}
Won
Lost
Student {0} has been expelled for not participating {1} times in the past 24 hours.
Your role is simple - try to survive. Each day, you will have a chance to lynch the student.
You are Klaus. Each night, you may choose a student, and have their ability revealed to you. Admit to your role wisely: If you reveal you are Klaus, Luther will try to attack you!

You get to have fun! Each day, you will attempt to decieve your fellow students. However, each night, you will get to pick a student to attack!\nNote: If you attack the Cha-cha, they will become a Luther like yourself! Hooray friends!\nIf you attack the Diego, you yourself will become drunk, and will be unable to do the next attack as you sleep off your hangover! (Usually, this means you can't attack the following night, but if the Wolf Cub was killed and the Drunk was your first choice, you won't be able to kill the second player, and you will still be able to attack the following night.)

As Harlot (you slut...) you will be given the chance to 'visit' another player each night. If they are not the wolf, you will be told so (because you live!). If you visit a wolf, you will be killed. If you visit the player the wolves have chosen to kill, you will be killed as well. However - If you are visiting a player, and the wolves choose to kill you, you will survive (you weren't home)
You drunken bastard! As the drunk, you are still just a citizen. BUT! If the wolves kill you, they will become disabled for the next kill, as they are drunk off your insanely high BAC.
As the cursed, you are a regular citizen... until the wolves kill you. Once they do, you will become a wolf as well! Free to kill in the night... XD
You are a traitorous bastard. If you survive long enough for all the wolves to die, you will become a werewolf, ready to kill your former teammates in the night!
You are the Guardian Angel! Each night, you may choose a player to watch over. Be careful however - if you choose to watch over a wolf, there is a 50% chance you will be killed.
You old sleuth. Each day, you will have the chance to investigate another player. Use this carefully however, for these is a 40% chance the werewolves will detect you!

A bit trigger happy are we? As the gunner, you are given 2 silver bullets at the beginning of the game. Each day, you will have the chance to shoot another player. Once you do, everyone will know you are the gunner! Be careful though, you only have 2 bullets!
The Tanners goal is simple: Get Lynched. If the Tanner gets lynched, they win, period. Everyone else loses.
The fool is told they are the seer.... when they choose to see someone's role at night, they are told a random role.
As a cultist, it is your goal to convert all other players (except wolves) to your cult. If at the end of the game, all living players are cultist - the cult wins
Your job is to hunt the Cult. If the cult attacks you, their newest member will die. Each night you may pick a player to 'hunt' - if they are a cultist, they will die.
At the beginning of the game, you will choose someone to be your 'role model'. If they die, you become a werewolf.
For now, you are a normal citizen. However, if the seer dies, you will become the new seer.
You will be told who the seer is (the real one, not the fool).
A builder's job is simple - they automatically know who the other builders are. Otherwise, they are just like a regular citizen.

Your ancestors had the ability to metamorph into others... while you don't have their full abilities, you can pick a player at the start of the game. If that player dies, you will become what they were. Note: If the player was converted to cult, you will take on their original role. All other normal rules apply: If they were Wild Child and their role model died, you will become a wolf. Otherwise, you will inherit their role model. The cult cannot convert the Doppelgänger (but can after the doppelganger switches roles). Also - the Doppelgänger can NOT win unless they have transformed. If at the end of the game, the Doppelgänger is still the same, they lose (exception: lover)

💘 Love is in the air. As a Matchmaker, you will choose two players at the start of the game. These two players will become madly in love! If one of them dies, the other will die of sorrow :( Note: Lovers will know who each other are, but not be told their roles. If the lovers are the last two alive, they win, regardless of teams. If the lovers are on different teams (citizen + wolf), and one team wins (wolf), the lover (citizen) wins as well. TL;DR if at least one of the lovers was on the winning team, they both win together.

A trigger happy, vindictive player. As the town hunter, you try to keep to yourself. However, when others come to visit you, they may find themselves dead, as your paranoia takes hold and you shoot. If the wolves attack you, you have a chance to take one of them with you. Otherwise, if you die, you will get a chance to shoot someone as you die. Note: For wolf attacks, the chance starts at 30%. If there is one wolf, the town hunter has a 30% chance to kill the wolf (and survive). For each additional wolf, add 20% (2 wolves = 50%, 3 = 70%, etc). However - if there are multiple wolves, while you may kill one of them, you will still be outnumbered and killed. If the cult tries to convert you, they have a 50% chance to fail. If they fail, you have a 50% chance to kill one of them!

That asylum was silly anyways. What a joke. You are free now however, back to business as usual - killing! The serial killer is a lone player, on their own team. They can win only if they are the last player alive (exception: lovers). As the serial killer, you can kill ANYONE - wolves, town hunter, gunner, guardian angel, whatever. If the wolves try to attack you, you can kill one of them (random), and live.

“One Stormy Night” a cartoon on how friendship started between a wolf and a goat. Similar to most of here, without knowing each other personally, we started talking and become friends... One day a group of people realized that it could be more than a movie and so the "Stormy Night Bot" was created, a bot that values ​​fun among its players.

You have successfully enrolled in the Academy in {0}
Time to send ping message: {0}
You are Syd 🎖. Your vote during the expulsion will count twice, once you have revealed yourself. You are on the students' side.

You are secretly the Raymond Chestnut 🤴🏻, escaping from your boring, pampered life by spending the day with these peasants. If they try to expel you, they realize their error, and no one will be expelled.
You are the Young Klaus 🤕: You’ll try to vote, but there is a 50% chance you’ll vote for someone else other than you intended instead. You’re still students' side though.

You are the Herb 🔮, allying yourself with creatures of the night rather than students. At night you will use your power to find Luther or Klaus. You stay only if Luthers win. Enjoy helping snuff out those fucked up students.

You are the Leonard Peabody ⚒: the engineer of the Academy. You have a small amount of blocks, enough to prevent Luther from attacking for one night. During the day, you can choose to build blocks and make it a wall.

You are the Markus ⚡️; the source of the scourge. Your attack is the cause of the curse that turns students just like Luther. Each night, you will choose a student to attack, but as long as you are alive, your victim has a 20% chance of turning as Luther.

You are the Young Luther 🐶; adored by Markus. Like other type of Luthers, you will choose a student to attack every night. If you happen to be killed or expelled, your pack will fly into a rage and attack two student the next night.

when the students begins to expel {0}, they say “Wait! I am the Raymond Chestnut. This royal ring, with the seal of the king proves it. Every night I am surrounded by servants. So I cannot be evil.” Feeling foolish, the students sheepishly retire for the night.
You try to look at {0}, but can't quite make out what they are. They are not Luther or Klaus however...
{0} steps forward and presents the official seal as the Student Leader, declaring themselves as such. From now on, {0}'s votes for expulsion will count twice.
Click "Reveal" whenever you are ready to reveal yourself as the Student Leader.
Reveal
Would you like to build the blocks today, disabling Luther tonight?

While the rest of the students debates over the events, they suddenly notice {0} wandering around building wall across the lobby. For now, at least, the Academy will be safe from Luther attacks. (Luthers are disabled tonight.)
Syd 🎖
Raymond Chestnut 🤴🏻
the Herb 🔮
the Young Klaus 🤕
Leonard Peabody ⚒
Markus ⚡️
Young Luther 🐶

As the Luther attacks {0}, {1} stops everyone, being the head of the experiment. {1} tells the pack that {0} should join the pack instead of dying, so the pack leaves them to their failed attack. They will become a Luther tomorrow night.
You were attacked by the Luthers, but Markus chose you. Instead of being killed, you have been infected... and will become a Luther tomorrow night!
As night falls, you feel a strange tingling, and your body aches as it begins to transform... You are now a Luther!

As Syd, you are a normal student, until you reveal yourself. Then you are given twice the vote count for expulsion (meaning that your vote is twice as powerful as everyone else's). Use that power wisely to help the Student’s team.

The prince is a key role in the citizens' team strategy. Once the prince gets lynched, their role as Prince is revealed, and they survive. However, this can only happen once: if the citizens insists on lynching them, they will die.
Do you remember the good old seer? Well now, it has its Wolf Team counterpart. The sorcerer is the Wuff's Seer. They can only see if someone is Wolf or Seer, and they win with the Wolves.

You are the Clumsy Guy. Maybe you should not have had so much alcohol for breakfast. You can't see a damn thing. Can you even vote for the person you want to? (You have a 50% chance to vote for someone random.)

You are the BlackSmith. Through the years, no blades nor swords gave you as much satisfaction as the Silver Blades the elves ordered.\nYou might have some silverdust left. Who knows ? It might *prevent Wolves from eating tonight* 🤔
You are the Alpha Wolf, the origin of the curse, the bane of banes. Every night, there's 20% chance that you will bite your pack's meal, and they will join your ranks instead of dying!

What a cuuuute little wuff. _tickles tickles_ -cough cough- As i was saying, you are the Wolf Cub and you _drops the mic_ -I just can't resist that. I think if anyone killed you, I'd give the wuffs two victims. You're too cute to die. I wouldn't be able to tickle you anymore-

Viktor sends {0} to try to convert {1}, but instead {0}'s Head comes flying out of the academy... Wonder why they thought it was inedible! {0} is dead...

{0} slips into {1}'s dorm, ready for a night of passion, only to find a mysterious student surgically removing {1}'s innards! Chet Rodo decides to satisfy {0} before adding a slutty heart to their collection!
The students awake to find {0} the successor of Klaus, practicing how Klaus supervises the students, with head missing. Ben is dead.

Seems like {0}, Leonard Peabody, must have been extremely unlucky. Five knives, fresh from {0}'s armory, were found plunged into their hands, feet and head, and pinned to the engineer’s table last night. Maybe Chet Rodo was hoping to expand their weapon collection alongside their organ one...
{0} was found stabbed to death with a shattered glasses by their bottles. The Chet Rodo has struck again, regardless of innocence, beliefs and titles! {0} was a Viktor.
The next morning, the students were heartbroken to find {0} a.k.a. Sissy split from head to toe. Strangely the heart was missing...

The students had hoped to meet {0} to compliment their Martell, but all they found in {0}'s home was a broken knife and liver. All those years of drinking led to a liver so hard that even Chet Rodo probably does not fancy it...
{0} would normally have managed to fight off Chet Rodo, but it was an irony that the Boss Guardian’s halo has extinguished. {0} is dead.

Looks like {0} was caught napping last night! A gunshot was heard last night, but all there was was the remains of Hazel, with a bullet hole to the head and a stab to the torso. Clearly Chet Rodo has won.

WTF! {0} the Student Leader was found pinned with a knife on the table while working overnight at the library! Clearly it's Chet Rodo exacting revenge for the Academy expelling him off just because of the bad students!

Bells ring from the whole Academy before the sunrise, as armed guards flood the lobby investigating the disappearance of Raymond Chestnut {0}. No clues were discovered, but it is suspected that Chet Rodo is in the Academy...

{0}'s guards were caught napping last night. The royal remains of {0} were found, hung in various parts of the Academy, having fallen prey to the knife. No amount of princely blood would deter Chet Rodo’s blade.

The Students wake up to a rotting corpse of {0}, split from head to toe, stabs all over. Strangely the brain was carefully extricated, as if it was a premonition that the city has lost their top brains. {0} was Klaus.
A loud mourn can be heard in the lobby. A mistake has been made. The Luthers have killed one of their own. The Herb {0} is dead.
Cries of "I'm your ally!" were heard last night. All the students found next morning were an exhumed body and smashed mystical ball, belonging to {0}, the Herb. Hunger trumps comradeship...
RAWRRRRRR! Luther were heard last night, attacking up a Vanya, {0}, leaving behind only a reduced-size skeleton! The city wondered if Luther felt any guilt tearing apart the defenceless child.
The Students wake up in the morning, only to find the severed body parts of {0}, Reginald Hargreeves, in a cart placed in full view outside the hall. Lesson learnt: don't visit the dorm of Chet Rodo!
The body of {0}, Reginald Hargreeves, was found in the hall, albeit cut precisely into a hundred pieces. Checking if Chet Rodo was a Viktor does not seem to be a good idea...

While it seemed that the Luthers decided to stay good for once, punishing {0}, a Viktor that decided to court trouble with the Luthers, proved too difficult to resist. {0}'s head was converted to a fine supper, delivered to the Luthers' doorsteps!

The Viktor ran into unexpected trouble last night. Their newest member had the misfortune of visiting Luther on the night the Luthers decided to stay at the Dorm, and the Luthef found {0} quite delicious. Unfortunately for {0}, Luther have no interest in joining the new gang.

The Viktor thought they would have a new member in their gang, but they were wrong! {0}, a Viktor, was minced to pieces and placed at the lobby in the morning! Strangely their book filled with gang rules was found stabbed with a knife!

Last night, the Viktor tried to convert the one person in the Academy crazier than they are. Their newest member tried to convert Chet Rodo, and Chet Rodo made a new piece of art in the lobby of {0}'s internal organs.

It was supposed to be a night where {0} would save the Academy from the killers, but {0}'s halo was extinguished and wings sliced by Chet Rodo! Left was a note, "I could protect myself better than you can."

{0} tried to guard Luther last night. The Students woke up to find only the wings of {0} hung on the ceiling in the lobby. Clearly the Luthers had an extra meal god-sent, free-of-charge, to their dormitories.

Knowing only {0} was left, {1} tries to attack {0} up, but {0}'s military training and paranoia proves too much to handle! All there is left is a carcass with two shots to the torso and the last man standing: the victorious Carl Cooper for the Academy!

Knowing only {0} was left, {1} chose a time where {0}'s guard was at their lowest. Eliminating the final student proved to be effortless for {1}, for all there remains is a mutiliated body of {0}, Carl Cooper, adorned with parallel slashes to the face.

{1} and {0} walk out in daylight. Seeing a shimmering cross worn around {0}'s neck, the righteous {1} draws their sword for the final time, putting an end to the twisted learnings of the Vikror that have contaminated the Academy.

As the sun starts to shine on the academy, {0} wakes to the sound of silence. Realising there was no one left, {0} walks and walks, until they stand alone in the middle of the hall. Looking at the sight of the corpses strewn all across the Academy, {0} sighs. Their lifelong dream of being chosen to be expelled by the students is as dead as the students are. They reach out and touch the rope, that had taken many lives, tenderly, before slipping it around their neck and letting themselves hang freely, with a sad smile on their face.

{0} wakes up at dawn, alone. {0} sees how abject a failure they has been, not being able to get the Academy to satisfy their masochistic desires of being expelled. {0} grabs a rope and hangs himself, realising no one can accomplish their dream, since there is no one left.

{0} opens their eyes, but instead of hearing the usual bustle of the Academy, they are met with silence. They stare at the dreary ceiling, letting reality slowly sink in. Everyone was dead. The Luthers were dead. With a pang in their heart, {0} gets up, and packs their things, before walking to the edge of the Academy. A tear slips from their eye, as {0} recalls how close they and their Luthers were to victory. Alas, it was time to start a new life, with a new pack. {0} slips into the darkness of the country, away from the quiet Academy.

For all of {0}'s efforts, {0}'s Luther friends lay motionless and lifeless. Even if the Luthers have been brought victory, there is no one to savour the success with, neither are there any living students to mock at. {0} peers into the crystal ball, and silently disappears, in a cloud of fog, in search of new Luthers, new allies, and new treachery to commit new crimes against humanity.

You are Grace 🧿. Each night you can check someone’s ability, but you will only be able to see what they are NOT capable of. You will be given an ability of someone else in the Academy that is still exists, so pay attention to what ability is said, that means one is still enrolled :)

You are Agnes ☮️. You can choose to convince everyone in the academy not to expel anyone. This can only be done once.

You are Mr. Edelman 🧓🏻. You can survive Luther’s attack once - the second time they can attack you. If Hazel or the Carl Cooper kill you with their abilities, they will lose their powers out of sorrow and will be converted to a regular Student as their magics will be surrendered.

Mr. Edelman 🧓🏻 can survive Luther’s attack once - the second time they can eat you up. If the Gunner or the town Hunter kill you with their abilities, they will lose their powers out of sorrow and will be converted to a regular student.
You are the Kugelblitz 😈! You can steal a student’s ability on the first night and turn that player into a student!

You are the Kugelblitz 😈! Since the [Full Thief] mode is turned on, you get 50% chance to steal a student’s ability every night, if successful, that player will become the new thief and continues with the theft!
the Kugelblitz 😈

Marcus Hargreeves is the raging Student in the academy. When they start yelling, the whole Academy gets out of control. To gain silence, they will expel twice that day!

You are Marcus Hargreeves 🤯. As the student in the Academy, you're on the verge of puberty. One day, when you feel especially annoyed by everything, you can cause a huge furor and the Academy will expel twice that day.
Do you want to cause trouble today?
{0}, Marcus Hargreeves 🤯 is making trouble! You have to comfort him and let him be calm! However, you need to expel twice today!
Because of Marcus Hargreeves, you are going to expel twice today! Hopefully they are going to be quiet tomorrow.
the Sloane 👨‍🔬

The Sloane is a quite crazy person who likes to brew potions and mess up with them. They mix two potions and force other people to choose one to drink, while the Sloane will drink the other. However, while one potion is just tasting like rosebuds, the other one is going to kill you instantly. Good luck when they visit you!

You are the Sloane 👨‍🔬! Your love for poisonous potions is huge and as a hobby you like to gamble with your life... Just a bit! You brew two potions, one of them being poisonous, the other neutral, looking exactly the same. Every other night, you can choose a student and force them to have a drink with you, maybe they are lucky and survive. However, if your host chooses the good drink, you'll get the poisonous one and die. Good luck!
While the other students are going to bed, you're still up in your laboratory, mixing the potions for the next night. Make sure to not get caught by a Luther though!
Who would be a good host and gambling partner tonight?
You went to {0}'s dormitory to have a drink with them, however, as you arrive there, they are already dead!
You got visited by the Sloane 👨‍🔬 {0}! They pulled out a knife to force you to drink, but instead of drinking, you pulled out your own knife. Apparently, your knife was stronger 🤷‍♂️
You go to {0} to let them choose a potion, however, they were Chet Rodo and stabbed you! 🔪
The Sloane 👨‍🔬 {0} tried to force Chet Rodo to a game tonight. Looks like the murderer didn't feel like playing games... {0} was found, stabbed, with two potions still in their bag!
You got visited by the Sloane 👨‍🔬, they forced you to choose a potion and you chose the poisonous one. What a sad way to leave this world...
You visited {0} and let them choose a potion! They chose the poisonous one and you returned to their designated dormitory, satisfied of your gambling skills. This is no game of chances!
The Sloane 👨‍🔬 has visited {0} tonight and they chose the poisonous potion! While the crazy chemist is still alive, {0} died. {1}
You got visited by the Sloane 👨‍🔬 {0}, they forced you to choose a potion. After a moment of hesitation, you chose the good one! Lucky you!
You visited {0} and let them choose a potion! They chose the good one however! In result, you drank the poisonous one and died. Maybe you should have done a better job...
The Sloane 👨‍🔬 {0} was found dead! Apparently, {0} had bad luck and drank the poisonous potion during their nightly visit! Pray you never bought your medicines from them...
{0} wasn't home! You drag your suitcase back home, cursing your bad luck.
The Viktor’s gang members are currently: {0}
Jack Ruby 🐺❄️

You are Jack Ruby 🐺❄️. Every night, instead of following your pack to attack someone, you skulk around on your own to freeze someone out of your pack. A frozen student will be unable to use any night actions, if they have any. However, your victim will have some residue of your power the next night and can not be frozen a second time in a row.

The Snow Wolf 🐺❄️ is a wolf that was native to the snowcapped mountains near the village. As such, they have mastered the art of controlling ice and snow. Having lived alone for a long time, the Snow Wolf prefers to operate alone. Instead of hunting with their pack at night, they can pick a separate victim to freeze, which causes them to be unable to use their night actions. However, they will still have some residue of the Snow Wolf's magic the next night, causing them to be immune to the Snow Wolf for one night.

As you opened the door to leave your dorm, a gust of wind blew towards you, causing you to freeze in your tracks 🐺❄️. You stand frozen in the doorway, silently cursing this weird form of bondage. Ah well, thank goodness you're thawed now.

As you stirred in your sleep, preparing to wake up to get your potions, a strong gust of wind blew in from the windows, causing you to freeze 🐺❄️. From the corner of your eyes, you saw the bottles of your potions frosted over. Looks like they didn't escape the brunt of the freezing spell either. You mentally sighed, wishing the sun came up sooner... Good thing you're thawed now, though.

As you donned your cloak and prepared to leave your house, a gust of wind blew in from the doorway, causing you to freeze 🐺❄️. Your fellow gang members dropped by soon after to bring you along to Viktor’s people, but they ended up laughing at your demise. Leaving you by the doorway, they promised that they'll make good work of tonight. Now that you're unfrozen, you leave the dorm, cringing in embarrassment.
As you grabbed your sword, a gust of wind blew in from the window, causing you to freeze, back still arched 🐺❄️. You mentally groaned, your limbs aching from being in this position until now...

As you sat at your table, ready to use your psychic powers, a gust of wind blew in from the window, causing you to freeze 🐺❄️. While being bound usually isn't a problem, the freezing spell also gave you a serious case of brain freeze. You weren't worried though, knowing that the sun rising is one of the constants of this world and that you'll be thawed now.

As you willed your wings to appear, a gust of wind blew in from the windows, causing you to freeze 🐺❄️. You inwardly cringed as you suddenly imagine yourself as an ornament on a Christmas tree. Thankfully, this is now over since the sun has risen.

As you admired your liver collection one last time before leaving your house, a gust of wind blew in from the windows, frosting the glass jars... freezing you 🐺❄️. As you unfroze this morning, you gritted your teeth in annoyance at Jack Ruby’s spell, swearing to make them suffer as much as possible when you take their liver.

As you sulked around the village, you felt a strong gust of wind. You stood frozen in your tracks, literally unable to move 🐺❄️. Luckily, it was dark enough for you to not be recognised by anyone who passed you that night. When you were completely thawed by dawn, you scampered back to your home before anyone could see you.

While you were sleeping last night, you suddenly felt really cold. Waking up to check, you realised that you couldn't move at all! Looks like Jack Ruby 🐺❄️ has cast a freezing spell on you. You go back to sleep, unconcerned, since it didn't affect you at all... apart from making you feel cold.
You head to {0}'s house to freeze them, but you are met by a tall dark figure, armed to the teeth. The Boss Guardian fights you off, and you head back defeated.
You went to {0}'s house and froze them! Tonight, they won't be able to use their night actions (if any).
Jack Ruby {0} attempted to freeze someone last night, but accidentally visited Chet Rodo! The murderer noticed the unwanted visitor and stabbed {0}!

As all the other Luthers have died, you are the last part of the pack that is left! In order to gain some fresh citizen meat, you decide to become a normal Luther from now on, who goes eating rather than freezing at night!
Jack Ruby {0} tried to freeze Carl Cooper last night, but Carl Cooper was able to catch them and take them down with their rifle!

You are Otto ☠️. Every night, you dig the graves for all the students who died since the last time you did (yes, even luthers deserve a proper burial). Since you are out all night, luthers and the viktor’s people can't find you, unless you actually have nothing to do (i.e. no one died), in that case you'll just stay at your home near the student’s dorm. Everyone who visits you has a chance of falling into your newly dug graves, depending on how many graves you dug. Also, the chance is halved for everyone who is on the students' team with you. But since you are out at night, the luthers or Chet Rodo might spot and kill you, and the more graves you have to dig, the more likely it is. Also, apparently Chet Rodo can find you whether you're at home or not, but they might at least stumble in one of your graves and hurt their leg, causing them to maybe lose control over who is their victim the next night...

You are Otto ☠️. It is your responsibility to get rid of the ​​dead bodies. You dig a grave for everyone who was killed since last night. However, you usually get too tired to finish the grave, so it remains uncovered. Some visitors might fall in and die... At least, the Luthers can't eat you since you are out all night.
Otto ☠️
The dead are buried, and the living are not. Everything is as it should be, and you can get a good night's sleep.
Until late into the night, you dig the grave(s) for {0}. May their souls come to rest and their bodies lie in peace.

As you left your house to bury those who passed away, a gust of wind blew in from the shadows, causing you to freeze. Unable to move, you waited for the sun to go up and thaw you. The dead will have to be restless for yet another night...
The pack heads to the house of {0}, just to find that they are not home. All you can see is a candle shining lonely on a grave...
The pack heads to the house of {0}, but on the way there, {1} suddenly steps into a bear trap, falls into an open grave and gets impaled by a silver spear!
As you just want to close the grave you dug all night, you notice a foul stench, different from the usual smell of dead bodies... The Luther {0} fell into the grave and died!

You cut the liver out of {0}'s body, but on your way back you leaned too far over an unfinished grave and stumbled into it. Maybe you shouldn't have looked for the liver of the corpse... Now your leg really hurts.
On your way to the house of {0}, a sharp pain surges through your leg. You decide to just go to the nearest house, which appears to be {1}'s, murder them and hurry home.
You arrive at {0}'s house, just to see the Boss Guardian standing in front of it! You try to fight, but you stand no chance. Tonight really was a bad night for you...

Another night without being able to slay one of those bloody Viktors! Frustrated, you walk over the graveyard, without noticing the bear trap until it closes around your ankle. You scream and struggle, but it's too late. You fall backwards into a grave that {0} left open and the sound of your neck breaking is the last thing you hear before everything goes black.

After another tiring night, you walk back to your home with the sun already rising. Just before you arrive, you notice a sword lying on the ground next to an unfinished grave. Inside that grave you see the dead body of {0}. Reginald Hargreeves should not have suspected you...

You return from another tiring night, when suddenly you hear a scream from one of your unfinished graves! You hurry there, just to find {0} lying dead in an unfinished grave. What kind of Viktor tries to convert Otto, anyway?

On your way to {1}'s house, {0} suddenly decides that it would be a good idea to burn down their bunk as well. They lead you through the graveyard when suddenly a bear trap snaps around their ankle! All you can hear is their scream before they fall into a grave and you run for your lives.

As you are on your way to {0}'s house, you try to remember which of your drinks was the poisonous one again and stumble, falling into an open grave where a silver spear pierces right through your heart. Before you can make a sound, you are dead.

"I could use a glass of wine now", you think to yourself. A strange feeling lets you look into a grave next to you, and as if fate heard your wish, a bottle of wine lies inside! Too bad there's also {0}'s dead body... Suddenly, you lost all your appetite.

You put your favorite lipstick on and head to {0}'s house to have a little fun. Sadly, you don't get far enough, as you step into a bear trap and fall into a grave on the way... Talk about occupational risk!
Apparently fate doesn't want you to have fun... Not only that you have to dig graves all night, you even find {0}, the harlot, dead in one of your unfinished graves. No fun for you tonight!
You teleport to {0}'s house, carefully avoiding all the open graves, but when you arrive, their house is empty... Apparently {0} is out all night digging graves again!

Fortune surely didn't favor you tonight... You just wanted to watch over {0}, but instead you fell into an open grave after stepping into a bear trap and died! Why does Otto even have to secure some graves?

On your way home, you notice a feather lying around on the ground... You don't have to search long to find {0}, the Boss Guardian, lying dead inside one of your graves! Sometimes your "security measurements" really go off on the wrong people.

You sneak through the graveyard on your way to steal {0}'s magic, but you're too focused on not making a sound to notice the bear trap that clanks around your ankle! Not enough that your stealth is surely broken, you even fall into the grave next to you and break your neck!

Good thing you put security measurements around your graves... {0} tried to steal your magic last night, but they were caught in your bear trap and fell into your grave! Maybe now the Academy will believe you that your traps are actually necessary.

You should watch your step when you go to fire up someones dorm next time... You stepped into a bear trap, fell into a grave and got a silver spear right through your heart! Serves you right, you little pyromaniac.
From one of your graves you notice a smell of fire burning. Alarmed, you hurry there and find {0}, Harlan, lying dead inside. At least your dorm stayed clean...
One of the graves on the graveyard contained too many people tonight... Apparently {0} tried to visit Otto, fell into a grave and died! {1}

As Number Five {0} teleported to home after a night of fun they tried to take a shortcut through the local graveyard. They must have been still a bit dizzy that they didn't see the uncovered grave until they felt no grounds under her next step. Maybe they should have taken that daytime job they got offered yesterday!

The Viktors tried to burn the bunk, but as {0} led the gang through the graveyard, a bear trap snapped around their ankle! They screamed when they fell into an open grave and the other Viktors fled in terror...

Maybe {0} the Kugelblitz was trying to steal from the dead. Maybe it was karma. All we know is that they lurked around the graveyard when the trap snapped their leg. While falling into the grave, they wondered whether they should have brought a partner in crime for this job. {0} wont be stealing any more for sure!

As the pack goes to attack the next victim, {0} smells potential prey and doesn't notice the bear trap that snaps around their ankle! Surprised, {0} falls over into the grave, where the tip of a silver spear meets their head. Luckily Otto keeps their graves secured! {1}
You're just trying to do your job, when suddenly a crazy killer spots and stabs you! What a pity...
As you walk past the graveyard with blood on your knife, you notice {0}, Otto. Following your instinct, you decide there will be two victims for you today...
You're just trying to do your job, when suddenly a Luther jumps onto you from behind and kills you!
The packs runs across the graveyard, as they suddenly notice {0}, Otto. Before they can react, one of you jumps on their back and kills them with one bite.

{0} doesn't show up to the Academy’s meeting. Have they overslept again? As you go look for them, you find them lying dead on the graveyard, the shovel still in their hands. It seems they were surprised by Luthers in the night...
{0} is missing today... Did they maybe oversleep? You go look for them and find them dead on the graveyard, still holding their shovel. It seems they died from several stabbing wounds...

You are the arsonist. Like the serial killer, you are alone on your team. Every night, you may douse one targets house with kerosene. Once one or more houses are doused, you may choose to spark instead, burning all doused houses and killing everyone that is inside, including potential visitors. You win if you're the only one left.

You are Harlan 🔥. Your mom has died and you are cursed by having the power of the unknown mage yet you don’t know how to use it. Every night, you can set a fire in a dorm, however, you still need an enough power to lit it up wholy. You can only win if you are the only survivor.
Harlan 🔥
Do you want to set up a fire to another dorm or do you want to see all doused dormitories burn?
Harlan {0} tried to set up fire the dorm of Carl Cooper... They didn't quite survive that.
Lit Up
You successfully set up the fire to {0}'s dorm with kerosene!
A fire broke out in your dorm, but luckily the Boss Guardian was there and extinguished it right away! They'd make a good firefighter, if they weren't so busy protecting student...
You didn't quite expect a fire to break out when you went to visited {0}, but you saved them nevertheless! Ain't nobody gonna call you a bad protector...

You didn't have to fight off any enemies at {0}'s dorm tonight, so you had time to look around a bit and noticed that the dorm was set up the fire in kerosene! Since you got nothing better to do, you cleaned the dorm for them...

The Academy awakens to the smell of fire... It's burning! You try to extinguish the fire altogether, but you're too late to save the student whose houses were mysteriously set up the fire in kerosene. Today you mourn the deaths of the following student:\n{0}
The only one left is Harlan, standing on a pile of ashes. Harlan wins...
You should have kept a fire extinguisher! Now your dorm burnt down and you died inside...
Keechie 🦅
As you look into the skies, you see the birds form a very unusual pattern. That can only mean that {0} is not in the Academy.
The birds tell you that {0} is not part of the Academy right now.

You are the Augur 🦅. Every morning, you watch the birds and deduce a role that certainly is not in the game right now from their flight. They also will never tell you a role twice, so be sure you make use of that information!
You are Keechie 🦅. You have the power to see things, but quite different from Klaus or Grace. You are the only one who can see roles that are not in the Academy, and not even see one of them twice!
There are absolutely no birds in the skies today. That probably means you have seen all the roles that are not in the Academy already...
The pack storms into {0}'s dorm, when suddenly you notice smoke. You try to escape, but it's too late for {1}, who dies in the flames.
{0} should have stayed dorm tonight... They visited a burning dorm and died in the flames! {1}
The Luthers tried to eat someone tonight again, but Harlan was quicker! {0} couldn't escape from the burning dorm in time... {1}
Even though you still don't really know who the Sloane is, you are sure that they will never again do such a miserable mistake. The Sloane gave up on their job and became a normal student!
Only {0} and {1} are left... Suddenly {0} smiles, pulls out a match, lights it and throws it to the feet of {1}, who goes up in flames!
Harlan Team
You went to have a little fun with {0}, but their dorm is empty!

Which roles would you like to use in the game?

Configuration Tutorial:

✅ = Role enabled
❌ = Role disabled

After selecting the roles, you need to use the VALIDATE button in the bottom left corner to validate and enable your role selection! If you don't validate your selection, it will be ignored and all roles will be used!

If you disable too many roles, the bot will be unable to create a balanced game and the validation will fail! In that case, just enable more roles and validate again.

If the validation succeeded, the bottom left button says ✅ Valid ✅ and your role configuration will be used!
